title: Please describe the Other type of financing you will utilize.
label: Other Financing
description: Give enough detail for the Seller to understand.
tips: Sometimes buyers have alternate sources of financing, like a loan from a friend or relative. You can also add 'Subject to Financing' here as well.
small_print: For these non-traditional funding methods it is important that legal contracts exist, which will need to be disclosed to the Seller. All financing arrangements must be properly documented and may require additional verification during the purchase process.
